summary: Simple mod that adds a Dragonborn logo necklace.
descriptionHtml:
Simple mod that adds a Dragonborn necklace. No it is not the Akavari symbol for dragonborn. it is the symbol used on the box art for the game, and the game is about the adventures of the Dragonborn.

Craftable in jewelry. Works for male and female characters. Can be enchanted.

Anyone can add the necklace to a mod, but please give credit and post a link to the mod it is used in this mods comments.

Other mods by me:

[spoiler]
